Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: I beleive the GenAI was able to give me far more indepth feedback that i knew was coming from an unbiased source. Though it may not have been as in depth as that given in high school, I think the level of feedback given by genAI is far greater than that given in any of my uni classes. Therefore it has impacted my learning to be able to improve aspects of my assigmnets prior to submiting them.
